content.html: Let's say, hypothetically, you don't want to do your job anymore. It makes you miserable. However, you've been asking yourself, "What do you want to do?" for almost a year & you still don't have any good answers. What do you hypothetically do?
content.value:
Let's say, hypothetically, you don't want to do your job anymore. It makes you miserable. However, you've been asking yourself, "What do you want to do?" for almost a year & you still don't have any good answers.

What do you hypothetically do?
